description:
Miura has a calm and quiet personality. He has been Fujiwara`s best friend since middle school. Miura was seen not to have good stamina at the beginning of the series. He plays the shooting guard position and is the three pointer of the team. He is also talented at stealing balls from his opponents. He is also the one who can shoot Fade Away Three Pointers.
Source: Wiki
name: Miura Ranmaru
